enchantment.uniquebattle.golem_soul.desc: Gain Knockback Resistance in exchange for Speed
enchantment.uniquebattle.iron_bird.desc: Slightly increases Armor and Toughness. Grants further percs on ground
enchantment.uniquebattle.snare.desc: Hitting an Entity will snare it
Has a chance to damage the Targets Armor Durability
enchantment.uniquebattle.ares_fragment.d: Every Hit can either increase or decrease your Damage dealt. Chance increases with Player level
enchantment.uniquebattle.artemis_soul.de: Shift-rightclick an Anvil  with ender-related Items to store them. Killing an Entity saves the Soul in the Tool. Souls increase the overall yields. However your Tool needs to feast with Ender or Souls
enchantment.uniquebattle.deep_wounds.des: Hitting an entity without Chestplace, will cause it to bleed. Bleeding enemy take damage over time and increased damage
enchantment.uniquebattle.ifrits_blessing: Brennende Einheiten erhalten erhoehten Schaden. Schaden ist verdoppelt wenn du auch brennst
enchantment.uniquebattle.granis_soul.des: Press the specified Key to start dashing. Entities around the start and end location start bleeding
enchantment.uniquebattle.ifrits_judgemen: Hitting the same Entity more than 4 times with the same Tool will ignite you. Less hits grant you Rewards. Shift-rightclicking a Chest inserts the Items into the Chest
enchantment.uniquebattle.lunatic_despair: Teile mehr Schaden aus jedoch schadest du dir auch selbst
enchantment.uniquebattle.wars_odium.desc: Killing a Mob, has a Chance to respawn the Mob
tooltip.uniquebattle.stored.ender.name: Stored Ender Energy %s
